attributes.action: If you make your money in this country then you pay your tax in this country
attributes.additional_details:
To make our tax system a little fairer I want the Government to pass a law that states if you make your money in this country, then you pay your tax in this country.
For example 'Boots' is now owned by a foreign company or person. Before they paid about £900,000,000 in tax to help pay for our Schools Hospitals etc. Now they pay very little but still get their money from the people in this country. This means that every person in this country has to contribute £15 or so more in tax. This is totally unfair. This law would also get rid of offshore tax havens.
